article_title: R.I.'s Care New England pursuing affiliation with Mass. hospital chain
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description:
PROVIDENCE--After putting out a formal call for potential partners earlier this year, Care New England -- the state's second largest health network, with Women & Infants Hospital in its fold -- has settled on an offer to join forces with Southcoast Health System and its four hospitals in southeastern Massachusetts, the two organizations announced on Monday.
The potential affiliation is yet another local example of consolidation that is sweeping through the industry nationwide as hospitals
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
